body:
Wanna buy a new monitor :)
yes, you saw the description, I need good and not too expensive examples of a good monitor ;)
People hjave been saying in my youtube videos that my monitor is a square, it kinda is lol, gimme examples ;)
would love to be able to record with 1080p 60fps which i cant rn .-.

Thanks

-Sam

title: Wanna buy a new Monitor

replies.body: Go on pcspecialist and theres a 24" oled samsung  tv for £149
